Desc.entry: Organises groups for young people. GenR8 (aged 11-16 years) is a social group offering a safe environment for activities including film nights, Playstation, arts and crafts, trips and games nights. Small entrance fee for GenR8. The Vibe (aged 11-16 years) is a discussion group for young people and teenagers looking at world views and issues including God, sex, poverty and personal beliefs. Also regularly run activities for children and their families involving crafts, bible stories and a variety of games.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
